channel.title: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'
channel.description:
Hello guys! I was struggling with this so much, until I finally found something....
[b][i]Description: How to customise an NPC. [/i] [/b]
[i][b]Difficulty: 1/10 - EASY[/b][/i]
[b][i]Assumed Knowledge: Able to use Ctrl+F, copy + paste[/i][/b]
[i][b]Files/Classes Modified: Client: Class5.java[/b][/i]
[i][b]When you right click an NPC, It says;[/b][/i] [CODE] •Talk- to •Trade etc. [/CODE]
[b][i]This tutorial will show you how to edit what it says.[/i][/b]
[i][b]Client Side[/b][/i] [b][i] 1. Open Class5.java (this contains all your custom NPCs, for example, General Graardor. :P)[/i][/b]
[b][i]Search for:[/i][/b] [CODE] if(i == [/CODE]
[i][b]Above that add:[/b][/i] [CODE]
if(i == ####) { //change #### to your NPC ID. Class5.aStringArray66[0] = "Talk-to"; //You can change this if you like Class5.aStringArray66[2] = "Trade"; //You can change this if you like Class5.aStringArray66[3] = "Examine"; //You can change this if you like Class5.aString65 = "Your NPC/SHOP"; //Npc name Class5.aByteArray89 = "examine info here, put whatever you like.".getBytes(); //examine info } [/CODE]
2. Save and compile.
Tadaa! That's it! How to basically edit an NPC text when you right click them. This doesn't include making the action happen so if you right-click and choose an option, it won't happen, you will need to add the code yourself. I hope this helps you guys as much it has helped me. Thank you.

item.title: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551546”]This belongs in Private server client hacking, as this is not a server tutorial. Hell, it’s more of a snippet in the first place.

Also, this is for non-renamed clients, as a renamed client you will edit the definitions of an NPC in EntityDef.java

Good to see you figured it out though (Clients are annoying )[/quote]

Correction, non-renamed clients are annoying… lol If you know what you are looking at, it not so bad

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'

item.title: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This belongs in Private server client hacking, as this is not a server tutorial. Hell, it’s more of a snippet in the first place.

Also, this is for non-renamed clients, as a renamed client you will edit the definitions of an NPC in EntityDef.java

Good to see you figured it out though (Clients are annoying )

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Hello guys! I was struggling with this so much, until I finally found something…

Description: How to customise an NPC.

Difficulty: 1/10 - EASY

Assumed Knowledge: Able to use Ctrl+F, copy + paste

Files/Classes Modified: Client: Class5.java

When you right click an NPC, It says;

•Talk- to •Trade etc.

This tutorial will show you how to edit what it says.

Client Side
[b][i]

  1. Open Class5.java (this contains all your custom NPCs, for example, General Graardor. :P)[/i][/b]

Search for:

if(i ==

Above that add:

[CODE]

if(i == ####) { //change #### to your NPC ID.
Class5.aStringArray66[0] = “Talk-to”; //You can change this if you like
Class5.aStringArray66[2] = “Trade”; //You can change this if you like
Class5.aStringArray66[3] = “Examine”; //You can change this if you like
Class5.aString65 = “Your NPC/SHOP”; //Npc name
Class5.aByteArray89 = “examine info here, put whatever you like.”.getBytes(); //examine info
}
[/CODE]

  1. Save and compile.

Tadaa! That’s it!
How to basically edit an NPC text when you right click them.
This doesn’t include making the action happen so if you right-click and choose an option, it won’t happen,
you will need to add the code yourself.
I hope this helps you guys as much it has helped me.
Thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How To Edit The Right-Click Dialouge For NPC'
